Utilities classes

Utilities classes are helpers css classes that used to apply instant styles, In sparkUI we have many utilities divided to following types

Typography Utilities

class | usage .u-text--break-all | word-break:break-all .u-text--break-word | word-break:break-word .u-text--capitalize | text-transform:capitalize .u-font--bold | font-weight:700 .u-font--semibold | font-weight:600 .u-font--normal | font-weight:400 .u-direction--rtl | direction:rtl .u-direction--ltr | direction:ltr .u-text--trim | white-space:nowrap .u-font--xsuper | font-size:3rem .u-font--super | font-size:2rem .u-font--xlarge | font-size:1.5rem .u-font--large | font-size:1.25rem .u-font--medium | font-size:1rem .u-font--small | font-size:.875rem .u-font--xsmall | font-size:.75rem .u-text--left | text-align:left .u-text--center | text-align:center .u-text--right | text-align:right
